title: Appointment Setter (Chabacano/Spanish-Speaking) – $5/hr
job_overview:
We are looking for a reliable and fluent Chabacano or Spanish-speaking Appointment Setter to join our team.

???? Responsibilities:
 • Reach out to leads and prospects via phone, SMS, or email
 • Set appointments and manage follow-ups
 • Maintain CRM records accurately
 • Coordinate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers and report updates

???? Requirements:
 • Fluent in Chabacano or Spanish
 • Strong verbal and written communication skills
 • Previous experience in appointment setting, sales, or customer service preferred
 • Reliable internet connection and quiet workspace

???? Compensation: $5/hour
? Work Setup: Full-time, Remote

???? To apply, send the following:
 1. Link to your resume
 2. Loom video intro in English
 3. Loom video intro in Chabacano or Spanish
